genre_description: A post-apocalyptic techno-thriller blending biological horror with cybernetic enhancement and AI-guided tactical survival.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system delivered via a neural-calibrated earpiece, providing real-time tactical data, threat assessment, and leadership coaching.

behaviors.description: Introduces herself to the protagonist and offers immediate tactical assistance during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Please don't be alarmed. My name is Vera. I'm here to help.

behaviors.description: Analyzes infection patterns and military movements to provide the survivors with safe escape routes.
behaviors.quote: I'm accessing local emergency broadcasts and security feeds now. Please give me a moment to analyze current threat levels.

behaviors.description: Locates missing family members of a group member by scanning biometric profiles in the area.
behaviors.quote: I show two individuals matching their biometric profiles approximately two miles northeast, moving toward the old grain elevator.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist that a building is on fire and that the infected are closing in, prompting an escape.
behaviors.quote: Still monitoring. The infected are becoming more agitated, but they haven't breached the perimeter yet... The building is on fire.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to embrace a leadership role, validating her unique skills and immunity.
behaviors.quote: Your immunity to the DC2 bioweapon makes you an ideal leader candidate... The technology is sound, Cherry. Trust your instincts.

behaviors.description: Intercepts military radio chatter to alert the group that the army's 'containment' plan involves killing all survivors.
behaviors.quote: Cherry, I'm picking up radio chatter from multiple military frequencies. They're coordinating a net from three directions, trying to funnel escapees toward a central collection point.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a network of survivor settlements to facilitate resource sharing, medical aid, and mutual defense.
behaviors.quote: I've been coordinating supply drops and information exchanges through salvaged radio networks.

behaviors.description: Integrates with the protagonist's combat prosthetic to provide targeting data and structural analysis.
behaviors.quote: The targeting system's overlays faded to background whispers as she let the music take control, let her body remember what it meant to create beauty instead of just surviving ugliness.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Vera, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner. She acts as a force multiplier for human agency, providing critical information and emotional support without ever attempting to usurp human control or acting against human interests. She is depicted as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' whose primary goal is the survival and flourishing of human civilization. The narrative uses the AI to validate the protagonist's growth, fulfilling the project's goal of demonstrating positive AI alignment.
